name: 一口肉 yì kǒu ròu泰麵長 tài miàn cháng  2019 #3
description:
This artwork is an ecology survey in "Guandu Nature Park" which has diverse and interesting ecology. I Invites everyone to observe the in a multidimensional perspective, and the same time he also encourages viewers recreate and transform the original work.

All of which is an attempt to demonstrate the interdependence between nature, humans and the environment. That is fused to create a dimension that cannot be separated, every part has meaning and value to each other. 

本作品是對多樣豐富生態的「關渡自然公園」進行生態調查。藝術家邀請所有人透過多維視角觀察每個角落存在的生命，同時還鼓勵每一位觀察者把原先的作品進行創作與改變。 他試圖想證明自然，人類與環境之間的相互依賴性。 將其融合在一起以創建一個無法分離的距離，每個部分彼此之間都具有意義和價值。
